e="preserve">Lorenzo Soria (27 November 1951 – 7 August 2020) was an Argentine-born Italian journalist and executive. He was President of the Hollywood Foreign Press Association for three terms between 2003 to 2005, 2015 to 2017 and again from 2019 until his death. He worked as a journalist for "La Stampa" and "L'espresso". Soria was born in Buenos Aires.
Soria died on 7 August 2020 in Los Angeles from lung cancer, aged 68.
